text: Román Arturo Martínez Canales (born 18 August 2002) is a Mexican footballer who currently plays as a forward for Club América. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Club América Premier |2019–20 |Liga Premier - Serie A |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- |Club América |2019–20 |Liga MX |2||0||0||0||2Appearances in the CONCACAF Champions League||0||0||0||4||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !3!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexico youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Club América footballers Category:Liga MX players
